instructions: Open the item, then tap the Share button , Share, AirDrop, the More options button , or another button that displays the app s sharing options. Do one of the following: Tap the AirDrop icon in the row of share options, then tap the profile picture of a nearby AirDrop user. Tip: On iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, or iPhone 11 Pro Max, point your iPhone in the direction of another iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, or iPhone 11 Pro Max, then tap the profile picture of its user at the top of the screen. Above the row of share options, choose one of the people you know who have nearby devices available for AirDrop. Their profile pictures appear with the AirDrop icon .

Open Control Center , then tap the AirDrop icon . If you don t see the AirDrop icon , touch and hold the top-left group of controls. Tap Contacts Only or Everyone to choose who you want to receive items from. You can accept or decline each request as it arrives.

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Tap the General tab. Tap Accounts & sync . Tap Add account . Tap Email . Select email provider. Follow the additional prompts to add an email manually.

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Tap the General tab. Tap Accounts & sync . Select the account you want to delete. Tap the account name at the top of the screen. Tap the Menu key. Tap Remove account . Tap OK to confirm.
